com.ocelot.api.utils

Class GuiUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ocelot.api.utils.GuiUtils

  • public class GuiUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Copyright (c) 2019 Ocelot5836.

    This class contains some utility methods that would be most useful when rendering a GUI.

    Since:
    Jun 6, 2019

      • isMouseInside

        public static boolean isMouseInside(int x,
                                    int y,
                                    int width,
                                    int height,
                                    int mouseX,
                                    int mouseY)
        Checks if the mouse is inside of the specified location.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position to check
        y - The y position to check
        width - The width of the check area
        height - The height of the check area
        mouseX - The x of the mouse
        mouseY - The y of the mouse
        Returns:
        Whether the mouse is inside of that location

                                     int y,
                                     int width,
                                     int height,

        Draws an expanding gui with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        x - The x to draw the window at
        y - The y to draw the window at
        width - The width of the window
        height - The height of the window
        type - The type of gui to draw
